spec.name: Navigate to Example Domain
spec.description: Confirm chrome-devtools-mcp can navigate to a public site and detect expected content.

steps.description: Confirm the Example Domain page title is correct
Wait for the Example Domain heading to appear
Capture the page snapshot for debugging context

step.description: Confirm the Example Domain page title is correct

content.text:
# evaluate_script response
Script ran on page and returned:
```json
"Example Domain"
```

step.description: Wait for the Example Domain heading to appear

content.text:
# wait_for response
Element with text "Example Domain" found.
## Page content
uid=1_0 RootWebArea "Example Domain"
  uid=1_1 heading "Example Domain" level="1"
  uid=1_2 StaticText "This domain is for use in documentation examples without needing permission. Avoid use in operations."
  uid=1_3 link "Learn more"
    uid=1_4 StaticText "Learn more"
